Package ver14.SharedClasses.DBActions.Table

Enum Class Math

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Math>
ver14.SharedClasses.DBActions.Table.Math
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Math>, Constable
public enum Math extends Enum<Math>
Math - allows for math actions on columns and some math-related utilities for columns.
Author:
Bezalel Avrahami (bezalel3250@gmail.com)
